# Luminous Assassin, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** One summoned assassin

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 117

*You conjure a vaguely humanoid being composed of yellow light. It wields a radiant blade and moves with unearthly grace.*

This spell functions like *[[Luminous Assassin (Spell)|luminous assassin]]**,* except that the assassin has the statistics provided below.

**Luminous Assassin CR 5**

Male human rogue 5

N Medium humanoid (human, extraplanar)

**Init** +7; **Senses** Listen +8, Spot +8

**Languages** Common, Dwarven, Elven

**AC 17**, touch 13, flat-footed 14; [[Dodge (Feat)|Dodge]], [[Mobility (Feat)|Mobility]], uncanny dodge (+3 Dex, +3 armor, +1 shield)

**hp** 25 (5 HD)

**Resist** evasion

**Fort** +3, **Ref** +8, **Will** +2

**Speed** 30 ft. (6 squares)

**Melee** mwk rapier +5 (1d6+1/18–20)

**Ranged** *+1 shortbow* +7 (1d6+1/×3)

**Base Atk** +3; **Grp** +4

**Atk Options** sneak attack +3d6

**Combat Gear** *potion of cure serious wounds, potion of darkvision*

**Abilities** Str 12, Dex 16, Con 13, Int 14, Wis 10, Cha 8

**SQ** trap sense +1

**Feats** [[Dodge (Feat)|Dodge]], [[Improved Initiative (Feat)|Improved Initiative]], [[Mobility (Feat)|Mobility]] **Skills** [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] +11 (3.5 Balance, Tumble +11), [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]] +10, [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] +11 (3.5 Open Lock +11), [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] +11, [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] +10 (Listen +8, Search +10, Spot +8), [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] +11 (3.5 Hide +11, Move Silently +11)

**Possessions** combat gear plus masterwork studded leather armor, masterwork rapier, masterwork buckler, *[[Cloak of Resistance +1|cloak of resistance +1]], +1 shortbow,* 200 gp
